header.xliffext:poisonError: Handback file name: lo-mt_function-procedurename-doesn-t-return-a-value-on-all-code-paths.2a0b9d69c44d4342a6a9fe7919580668526be407.zh-cn is different with handoff file name: function-procedurename-doesn-t-return-a-value-on-all-code-paths.2a0b9d69c44d4342a6a9fe7919580668526be407.zh-cn.

trans-unit.source: Function '<procedurename>' doesn't return a value on all code paths | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 函数<过程名>并非在所有代码路径上都返回值 |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: Function '<procedurename>' doesn't return a value on all code paths
trans-unit.target: 函数<过程名>并非在所有代码路径上都返回值

trans-unit.source: Function '\<procedurename>' doesn't return a value on all code paths.
trans-unit.target: 函数\<过程名&1;> 并非在所有代码路径上都返回值。

trans-unit.source: Are you missing a 'Return' statement?
trans-unit.target: 是否缺少 Return 语句？

trans-unit.source: A `Function` procedure has at least one possible path through its code that does not return a value.
trans-unit.target: 一个`Function`过程具有至少一个可能不返回值的代码路径。

trans-unit.source: You can return a value from a `Function` procedure in any of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 您可以返回一个介于`Function`处于以下任一过程︰

trans-unit.source: Include the value in a [Return Statement](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/return-statement.md).
trans-unit.target: 中包括值[Return 语句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/return-statement.md)。

trans-unit.source: Assign the value to the `Function` procedure name and then perform an `Exit Function` statement.
trans-unit.target: 将值赋给`Function`过程名，然后执行`Exit Function`语句。

trans-unit.source: Assign the value to the `Function` procedure name and then perform the `End Function` statement.
trans-unit.target: 将值赋给`Function`过程名，然后执行`End Function`语句。

trans-unit.source: If control passes to `Exit Function` or `End Function` and you have not assigned any value to the procedure name, the procedure returns the default value of the return data type.
trans-unit.target: 控制权将传递给`Exit Function`或`End Function`和您没有任何值分配到过程名称，该过程返回的返回数据类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Behavior" in [Function Statement](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/function-statement.md).
trans-unit.target: 详细信息，请参阅"行为"中[Function 语句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/function-statement.md)。

trans-unit.source: By default, this message is a warning.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此消息是一个警告。

trans-unit.source: For more information on hiding warnings or treating warnings as errors, see [Configuring Warnings in Visual Basic](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/configuring-warnings-in-visual-basic).
trans-unit.target: 有关隐藏警告或将警告视为错误的详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Basic 中配置警告](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/configuring-warnings-in-visual-basic)。

trans-unit.source: **Error ID:** BC42105
To correct this error
trans-unit.target: 更正此错误

trans-unit.source: Check your control flow logic and make sure you assign a value before every statement that causes a return.
trans-unit.target: 控制流逻辑检查并确保导致返回每个语句之前赋值。

trans-unit.source: It is easier to guarantee that every return from the procedure returns a value if you always use the `Return` statement.
trans-unit.target: 很容易地保证每一次返回从过程返回一个值，如果始终使用`Return`语句。

trans-unit.source: If you do this, the last statement before `End Function` should be a `Return` statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果这样做时之前, 的最后一个语句`End Function`应`Return`语句。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: [Function Procedures](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/function-procedures.md)
trans-unit.target: [Function 过程](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/function-procedures.md)

trans-unit.source: [Function Statement](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/function-statement.md)
trans-unit.target: [Function 语句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/function-statement.md)

trans-unit.source: [Compile Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/compile-page-project-designer-visual-basic)
trans-unit.target: [“项目设计器”->“编译”页 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/compile-page-project-designer-visual-basic)
